OOC: Whew! Just got done with 741 e-mails. A lots happened. Any way, I'll 
post a little history as to what has happened with my characters, first and 
foremost Primal..ahem...May I say Optimus Prime?

::Primal Prime::

    Before the first fight at the Cybertronian Fire Primal had another 
vision. In this one everything became clear. He knows knew who is is, and 
what he must do.
    "Computer, scan area for unit Hot Rod," Prime said to his internal 
computer system. The computer fed him the location. (Not sure exactly, so I'm 
just gonna head in that general direction) Prime transformed to Ground 
Assault Mode and started to race to Hot Rod.
    "Hot Rod, Hot Rod. This is Optimus Prime, I need to speak with you," 
Prime said, now with a full Optimus Prime voice.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
::Cheetor::

    He had fired several shots at the Predacons, but all missed, he needed 
practice. He went inside the ship and went to a training facility. He has 
been there for quite some time now.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
::Bobertron::

    After trying to help the Maximals, he saw on the scanners that a 
Deception shuttle was leaving. He had it scanned and found that it contained 
the one known as Hell Beast. He now figured that it would be much easier to 
crush the Predacons, with the numbers weakened.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
::Pantron::

    After walking endlessly for weeks (He still won't be back for a while) he 
figured out the riddle. He found a natural bridge with many fossils around 
it. Looking around he found the Key to the Ark. Something deep inside him 
felt it would be wrong to give it to Bobertron, and that if Bobertron ever 
found out he would be scrap.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
::Magmatron::

    The Drake left his cave to return to his home. He sensed a shift in the 
power struggles of the planet. His biggest threat had returned from the 
grave. Flying as fast as his new wings could carry him, he reached the 
Destron base in a matter of minutes (before he had relatively small wings, 
now they are huge, you do the math). He transformed to Robot mode, it was an 
impressive on indeed. He stood well over what he used to. As soon as he 
walked into the base he had all controls transferred to him. He now was the 
base, in all aspects. Anybody that was as intimately connected to the base 
was fodder compared to what he was. Returning to one of his Labs he opened a 
drawer. In it was a small spider robot. He held it up and looked at it. His 
hand glowed a bright crimson red....
